FuncDef: This command configures the maximum allowed lifetime for each entry of the Python cache of this Python policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum lifetime that can be set on a cache entry in days. Values-0 to 7. ParamDefault: Default- 1
Specifies the maximum lifetime that can be set on a cache entry in hours. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the maximum lifetime that can be set on a cache entry in minutes. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the maximum lifetime that can be set on a cache entry in seconds. Values-0 to 59.
